name: Craftsman's Writ - Major Healing Potion
tooltip:
Craftsman's Writ - Major Healing Potion

Deliver 20 Major Healing Potions and the Craftsman's Writ - Major Healing Potion - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

Requirements:
- Major Healing Potion x 20
